rules_text: Lock, Stock, and Smoke deals 6 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
[i]“The Horizon Line Heist should have been the perfect plan. No dragon ever comes within three miles of the rail lines. Someone lured it there, and we gotta find out who.”
—Talon, Sidewinders second-in-command[/i]
